page.title: 08 A LOCAL BUS COMPANY.
page.content: Ken Hopkins is famous in Tonna for running and owning a bus company.He started his company in{1948}and at that time petrol was rationed to 3 gallons a week.Today,he has 32 large coaches,5 mini-buses,15 cars and one Rolls Royce which he hires out for weddings.Most of his buses work on school contracts but a few coaches are used on holiday tours. Mr.Hopkins said that he uses about{10,000}gallons of fuel every week.Buses are very expensive.Every time Mr.Hopkins buys a new bus it costs about{Â£60,000}but the really big luxury coaches can cost{Â£250,000. Mr.Hopkins is very proud of his buses and he has a photograph album of all his buses since he started the company.
